Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25312021]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5α(MIC=50 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2151(MIC=9.7 µg/ml).[Ref.26802742]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli NBRC 14237(MIC<12.5 µM);Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 12582(MIC<50 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC<12.5 µM);Micrococcus luteus NBRC 12708(MIC<25 µM);Fungi:Saccharomyces cerevisiae NBRC 10217(ND);Candida albicans NBRC 1594(ND).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25312021]0.4% Hemolysis against Rat erythrocytes at 20 µM.[Ref.26802742]2% Hemolysis against Rat erythrocytes at 50 µM.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: 3.8%,4.0%,4.9% α-helix were mearsured by CD spectra at 10 °C, 25 °C and 37 °C in 10 mm Tris-HCl (pH 7.2).
Sequence Information.Function: showed growth inhibitory effects on both Escherichia coli (Gram-negative) and Staphylococcus aureus (Gram-positive).
